Introduction

Kim Yong Sun, popularly known as Solar, is the leader and vocalist of the girl group 'MAMAMOO' under RBW Entertainment (formerly WA Entertainment). She is also a part of MAMAMOO's official subunit, 'MAMAMOO+'. She has her own YouTube channel, 'solarsido' on which she uploads videos of herself, occasionally accompanied by guests, doing challenges and vlogs.

Solar officially debuted as a soloist on April 23, 2020, with the single album "Spit It Out".

In 2022, Solar made her theatrical debut in the 2nd production of "Mata Hari". She was double-casted alongside Ock Joo-hyun for the titular role of "Mata Hari". The musical was announced by production company EMK Musical Company on April 6 with a teaser. The show premiered at the Charlotte Theater in Seoul on May 28 at 7 PM KST, and the performances lasted until August 15.
